title: The Science of Storytelling by Will Storr | One Minute Book Review
description:
This is one of my favourite books of the year so far. A must if you're wanting to know more about the steps it takes to make more compelling and engaging stories. 

Thank you for listening. If you would like to join the #OMBRClub for exclusive content such as our Weekly Newsletter.
